snippet: A real-time recounting of the media coverage of the Republican presidential primary.
abstract: A real-time recounting of the media coverage of the Republican presidential primary.

byline.original: By BRIAN STELTER AND DAVID CARR

lead_paragraph: While our colleagues on the Politics staff are reporting on the Republican presidential primary in New Hampshire, Brian Stelter and David Carr will be describing the media coverage, how journalism and politics mix and mingle and occasionally get mangled.

headline.main: Decoding the New Hampshire Primary Coverage
